attributes.action: support and pay families to look after their elderly relatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Supporting families that take care of their elderly has to be morally and socially correct in any society.  
I call on your support Prime Minister to follow suit with our european counterpants in enabling families to directly look after their elderly (if possible) and not be financially penalised for doing so.
It would be far cheaper in helping these families with tax breaks and allowances as opposed to the tax contribution of care homes.  These Care Homes are a business structure and not a family one.
